text: Oxford Blues is a 1984 British American teen comedy-drama movie directed by first time director Robert Boris and starring Rob Lowe, Ally Sheedy, Amanda Pays, Julian Sands, Julian Firth, Alan Howard, Gail Strickland, Michael Gough, Aubrey Morris, Anthony Calf, Peter-Hugo Daly. It is a remake of the 1938 movie A Yank at Oxford. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 comedy-drama movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in universities and colleges Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Movies set in England
title: Oxford Blues
